name: rfid-hotel-management-system
description: Complete RFID Hotel Management System with ESP32 integration, real-time monitoring, and advanced analytics

scripts.dev:frontend: cd Frontend && npm run dev || npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd Frontend && npm run build || npm run build
scripts.start:frontend: cd Frontend && npm start || npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && (cd Frontend && npm install || npm install) && cd Backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:frontend: cd Frontend && npm test || npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd Frontend && npm run lint || npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules Frontend/node_modules Backend/node_modules .next Frontend/.next Backend/.next
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.logs:backend: echo 'Check Render dashboard for backend logs'
